item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

make a sub-class. named: “Class20_Sub1” and add handleAnims() in your class20
[sup]
public class Class20_Sub1 extends Class20 {

public static void handleAnims(int j) {
/Start hardcoding/

/End hardcoding/
}
}
[/sup]
